actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that research and experimental expenditures of corporations, including personal holding companies, shall not be treated as items of tax preference for purposes of the minimum tax.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that research and experimental expenditures of corporations, including personal holding companies, shall not be treated as items of tax preference for purposes of the minimum tax.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that research and experimental expenditures of corporations, including personal holding companies, shall not be treated as items of tax preference for purposes of the minimum tax.
